docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Aug. 5 (Reuters) Left-wing guerrillas said today that they would accept nothing less than the release of all political prisoners before they granted freedom to a kidnapped American official and a Brazilian diplomat.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Aug. 5 (Reuters) Left-wing guerrillas said today that they would accept nothing less than the release of all political prisoners before they granted freedom to a kidnapped American official and a Brazilian diplomat.
docs.abstract: Tupamaros firm in demanding prisoners release, message brought by Judge Pereira, freed unharmed after wk; note also says hostages are well

headline.main: Uruguayan Rebels Firm in Demanding Prisoners' Release

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Aug. 6 (AP) A statement from leftist urban guerrillas today set a deadline for midnight tomorrow for the release of Uruguay's political prisoners.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Aug. 7 Urban guerrillas who are threatening to kill a United States adviser and a Brazilian consul they kidnapped a week ago seized another United States adviser today.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Aug. 8 With only hours remaining until the threatened execution by Marxist terrorists of an American hostage, the Uruguayan Government tonight reiterated its refusal to offer any kind of ransom.

docs.lead_paragraph: Winter rains pelted the Uruguyan capital of Montevideo last week as the Government's campaign against a band of urban guerillas calling themselves the Tupamaros reached a new pitch of intensity.
